ULTRAVOX_LANGUAGE_HINT.description: BCP47 language code that may be used to guide speech recognition.

FIRST_SPEAKER.description: Who should speak first on the call

CALL_TRANSFER.description: Allow ultravox to transfer the call to a human agent, None will disable, Cold will transfer the call and connec the caller to the agent immediatly, Warm will provide a summary to the human agent before the caller is connected.

TRANSFER_TYPE.description: Whether to use a SIP Refer or Dial a New call leg for the transfer to the human agent

TRANSFER_TO.description: Number to transfer calls to human agent

TRANSFER_FROM.description: Number to transfer calls to human agent

TRANSFER_CARRIER.description: Carrier to use when trasfering calls to human agent
